product_name: Mad Rock Ultralight Bent Wiregate Carabiner
long_description: Utilizing I-beam construction, the Mad Rock Ultralight bent wire gate carabiner maintains a light weight without sacrificing size or strength. Bent gate offers slightly more gate opening than straight gate to make clipping the rope quick and easy. With its flat shape, the wire gate makes rope clipping smooth and fast. Great for all-around use and for making your own quickdraws for sport and traditional climbing.
short_description: Utilizing I-beam construction, the Mad Rock Ultralight bent wire gate carabiner maintains a light weight without sacrificing size or strength.
